thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 55 of 3060
thread.title: Jan Neunzig

author: Jan Neunzig
title: Jan Neunzig
text:
Booked through Kayak. Pick up and drop off locations where at two different cities. Once it got booked, Rentalcars made the pick up and drop off location in the same city. Now I have to get in touch with rentalcars to fix the issue and hope I can keep the rate.
EDIT: Called RentalCars in Australia, waited for about 15-20 minutes but then the issue was resolved rather quickly and I got the keep the same price but drop off where I wanted. Of course a one-way drop off fee had to be added but I expected as much.
